3SG.F.summary: Rockpool Acquisitions Plc does not have significant operations. It intends to acquire a heating, gas, electrical, and renewable energy company in Northern Ireland. The company was incorporated in 2017 and is headquartered in Belfast, the United Kingdom.

BC-U.TO.summary: Bespoke Capital Acquisition Corp. does not have significant operation. It focuses on identifying and acquiring a business in the cannabis industry through a merger, amalgamation, arrangement, share exchange, asset acquisition, share purchase, reorganization, or any other similar business combination. The company was incorporated in 2019 and is headquartered in London, the United Kingdom.

BSN.summary: Broadstone Acquisition Corp. focuses on effecting a merger, share exchange, asset acquisition, share purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.

BSN-UN.summary: Broadstone Acquisition Corp. focuses on effecting a merger, share exchange, asset acquisition, share purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.

CLOW.summary: Cloudweb, Inc. does not have significant operations. Previously, it was engaged in providing Web hosting solutions in the United Kingdom. The company is headquartered in Stratford-upon-Avon, the United Kingdom.

EDTXU.summary: EdtechX Holdings Acquisition Corp. II intends to effect a merger, share exchange, asset acquisition, share purchase, reorganization or similar business combination with one or more businesses or entities. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.

IIAC.summary: Investindustrial Acquisition Corp. intends to effect a merger, share exchange, asset acquisition, share purchase, reorganization, or related business combination with one or more businesses. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.

IIAC-UN.summary: Investindustrial Acquisition Corp. intends to effect a merger, share exchange, asset acquisition, share purchase, reorganization, or related business combination with one or more businesses. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.

MUST.L.summary: Mustang Energy PLC does not have significant operations. It intends to acquire a target company or business or asset with operations in the energy or natural resources sectors. The company was incorporated in 2018 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.
